text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump trump’s incompetent mismanagement of the #coronavirus outbreak cost US 18 million jobs 

Getting 4.8 million back is nothing to cheer about, especially when his rush to reopen has now created a worse #COVID19 disaster & companies are shutting down again
